",["$r","p",null,{"children":["The React Team recommends migrating your tests to ",["$r","a",null,{"href":"https://testing-library.com/docs/react-testing-library/intro/","target":"_blank","rel":"nofollow noopener noreferrer","children":"@testing-library/react"}]," for a modern and well supported testing experience."]}],"

",["$r","p",null,{"children":["Be aware that ",["$r","code",null,{"children":"fireEvent"}]," dispatches an actual event on the element and doesnâ€™t just synthetically call the event handler."]}],"
